verbose_text: In another study, utilizing mice in the forced swim test, both morphine and agmatine (an endogenous aminoguanidine) decreased immobility time and these effects were blocked by pretreatment with naloxone (a mu-opioid receptor antagonist) [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: aminoguanidine) decreased immobility time and these effects were blocked by pretreatment with naloxone
